name: arewecontentwin32kstill
description: Automated and guided reporting for win32k usage in firefox content processes
author: Mozilla Platform Security

scripts.install: concurrently "cd client && npm i" "cd server && npm i"
scripts.clean: concurrently "cd client && npm run clean" "cd server && npm run clean" && npx rimraf node_modules/ .cache/ public/ **/__snapshots__/
scripts.build: concurrently "cd client && npm run build" "cd server && npm run build"
scripts.db:init: npm run db:create && npm run db:schema && npm run db:seed
scripts.db:reset: npm run db:drop && npm run db:init
